item.title: Asian markets are mixed after Wall St tumbles following poor US jobs report
item.description: Shares in Asia have mostly advanced after Wall Street had its worst day since May following the release of weak U.S. jobs data

item.title: All major Las Vegas Strip casinos are now unionized in historic labor victory
item.description: The Culinary Workers Union representing 60,000 hospitality workers in Nevada has achieved a historic victory on the Las Vegas Strip

item.title: China rejects US demands to stop buying Russian, Iranian oil
item.description: China has taken a firm stance against U.S. demands.

item.title: OPEC+ countries to boost oil production by 547,000 barrels per day
item.description: Some believe the boost in production could lower oil and gasoline prices.

item.title: What to know if you're at risk of having your wages garnished over student loan debt
item.description: Millions of student borrowers could begin having their wages garnished as soon as this summer
